word: Moses was educated in all the wisdom of the Egyptians, yet he said, "Behold, I have taught you statutes and judgments, even as the Lord my God commanded me, that ye should do so in the land whither ye go to possess it. Keep therefore and do them; for this is your wisdom and your  understanding in the sight of the nations, which shall hear all these statutes, and say, Surely this great nation is a wise and understanding people."--RH, Feb 25, 1896. (FE 393.)
